title: Technomedia to Exhibit at Human Resource Executive’s HR Technology Conference and Exposition
text:
NEW YORK – October 5, 2015
WHO: Technomedia , a leading provider of Talent Management Solutions
WHAT: Will be exhibiting in Booth #1127 at Human Resource Executive’s HR Technology Conference and Exposition .
WHEN: The conference will be held Sunday, October 18th, through Wednesday, October 21st, 2015. The exhibit hall will be open with a reception night starting on Sunday, October 18th from 5:00 pm – 7:00 pm, as well as full expo hall days on Monday, October 19th from 10:00 am – 5:30 pm and on Tuesday, October 20th from 10:00 am – 4:00 pm.
WHERE: HR Technology Conference and Exposition
 Mandalay Bay Convention Center
 3950 Las Vegas Blvd. South
 Las Vegas, Nevada
DETAILS: The HR Technology Conference focuses on the business process and organizational success enabled by technology, and covers all the latest trends – SaaS, The Cloud, social, mobile, analytics, video, gamification, Big Data and MOOCs – as well as the more traditional technologies and processes that still compete for HR’s attention. Whatever is changing the way work and HR gets done is what is featured. All sessions are created and delivered by senior executives from many leading organizations resulting in a high-caliber learning experience with real-world lessons and practical takeaways.
What’s more, the HR Technology Conference is home to the world’s largest Expo of HR technology products and services, and gives attendees (over 4,000 last year) the chance to discover the latest breakthrough ideas and tools and discuss new solutions and applications with the top leaders in HR technology. There is no better place to touch, compare and contrast the latest solutions from leading vendors in every category, as well as start-ups.
ABOUT TECHNOMEDIA
Since 1996, Technomedia’s cloud-based talent management solutions and services have enabled global organizations to cultivate high-performing workforces. Hundreds of companies in more than 70 countries rely on Technomedia’s award-winning software suite for talent acquisition, performance management, succession planning, compensation management, core HR hub, and learning and development. Technomedia powers talent awareness, which drives HR insights that ensure business alignment and talent engagement. Connect with us: Website | Twitter | LinkedIn | Facebook .
